attributes.action: Action for abbey road/charley road junction
attributes.background: Too many accidents at this blackspot, someone is going to be killed soon, something needs to be put in place.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Leicestershire Count Council is responsible for roads in this area.

You could start a petition using the council's site here

https://www.leicestershire.gov.uk/about-the-council/how-the-council-works/public-involvement/petitions

You could also raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
